contentList.content: Heirs of the mystical Feywild, high elves value magic in all its forms, and even those who do not study spellcraft can manipulate the Weave.
Ravenous undead driven by dark desires and a hunger for blood. They normally cannot survive in sunlight, and moving water burns them.
Heirs of the mystical Feywild, high elves value magic in all its forms, and even those who do not study spellcraft can manipulate the Weave.
Ravenous undead driven by dark desires and a hunger for blood. They normally cannot survive in sunlight, and moving water burns them.
This Black Dragonbornâ€™s scales are unusually weathered, their once-dark hues faded to pale, chalk-white patches, as though something has been slowly drawn out of them over time.
After two hundred years serving a cruel master, the vampire spawn Astarion is finally free - free to walk in the sun, free to chase power, and free to take revenge.
